actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress regarding the failure of the government of Bolivia to eradicate its illegal narcotics industry.

summary.text: Expresses the concern of the Congress over the failure of Bolivia to eradicate its illegal narcotics industry. Expresses the intention of Congress to take into account as a major factor in its consideration of future direct and indirect aid to Bolivia any continued failure by Bolivia to eradicate such industry.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress regarding the failure of the government of Bolivia to eradicate its illegal narcotics industry.
